page.shortlink: api random pct record list function
page.prototype: Recno_List as C = random_pct_record_list(N percent [,C filter])

argument.name: Recno_List
argument.description: The returned list of record numbers. Numeric

argument.name: percent
argument.description: The percent of records to return. Numeric

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table.

page.discussion: The RANDOM_PCT_RECORD_LIST() function returns a space delimited list of record numbers from the currently open table.
